citation: Proclamation under the Water Management Act 1999 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Water Management Act 1999

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Water Management Act 1999 fix 1 January 2000 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

13 December 1999

G. S. M. GREEN

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

D. E. LLEWELLYN

Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 December 1999

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Water and Environment.
